column2: If the specified version * it acts a wildcard that writes the relationships to all the version present for that particular model
column14:
Generated from the combination of column J-M. 
J -  Deny from
K - Deny to
L - Allow from
M - Allow to
column20: These columns track components and whether they have been accounted for within an existing relationship or not.

column6: A relationship that allows traffic from one Pod to another Pod via a NetworkPolicy.
